title: People of Greece
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Clifford J. Kamen
brief_description: Surreys modern Greece, showing how the rugged topography, the relative infertility of the soil, and the lack of natural wealth have influenced the agriculture and industries of the country. Depicts aspects of life in Greece, showing details of costume, religious and social customs, rural and urban activities, and examples of ancient and modern architecture. Includes scenes of Athens.
